head.supplied: 24/1/76 ¶ The Undersecretary. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you, that I proceed this evening to Creswick to give evidence in a thistle case at the local Court. I shall be back on Tuesday at n...

div.p: J76/693, unit 873, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
I have the honor to inform you, that I proceed this evening to Creswick to give evidence in a thistle case at the local Court. I shall be back on Tuesday at night or on Wednesday early.
